questions.question: Was I RESENTFUL?
Of who?
Was I SELFISH?
How?
Was I DISHONEST?
How?
Was I FEARFUL?
Of what?
Am I obsessing about anything?
Am I keeping any secrets?
Did I cause any harm?
Do I owe any apologies?
Was I kind and loving toward all?
What could I have done better?
Did I go to a meeting?
Did I pray?
Did I call my sponsor?
Did I call another alcoholic?
Did I help anyone?
Did I do service?
Did I meditate?
Did I fellowship?
Did I read any literature?
I will discuss my secrets with...?
I will apologize to...?
I will pray for relief from my obsessions and for guidance in my future actions?
